name: View-Master Masters of the Universe VR
name_original: View-Master Masters of the Universe VR
description:
***A View-Master® viewer or Google Cardboard compatible viewer is required.

*** View-Master® Masters of the Universe® Experience Pack is not optimized for the iPhone 5 or iPhone 5c.

SAVE ETERNIA WITH HE-MAN!

The ultimate battle for Eternia® has begun! Skeletor™ has seized Castle Grayskull® and captured He-Man™ and the Masters of the Universe®. Siphoning the Power of the Elders has made Skeletor and his minions insanely strong and invulnerable. He-Man is being held captive at Snake Mountain™ and you are the only one who can save him! Working side-by-side with He-Man, The Most Powerful Man in the Universe®, you must quickly defeat Skeletor and his minions and escape the evil lair. Otherwise, Skeletor will bring dark ages to all of Eternia! Use Power Ups and Upgrades to heal and strengthen your attack. Battle legendary villains like Beast Man®, Evil-Lyn™ and Skeletor. This time YOU have the power!

This game was designed to work best with the View-Master® Virtual Reality Viewer or Deluxe VR Viewer (sold separately). It also works with Google Cardboard. Just download the app, insert your compatible smartphone into the viewer and View-Master® will become your portal to immersive, 360-degree virtual reality adventures.

Come have a look around. You won’t believe what you can see!

• Enter the world of virtual reality with the View-Master® VR viewer and Deluxe VR Viewer (sold separately) and travel to Eternia to battle Skeletor alongside He-Man.
• Look for more View-Master® apps (sold separately) to visit new places, explore new environments and discover new worlds with a whole new level of realism!

Compatible Devices:
Requires iOS 8.1 or later. Compatible with iPhone 5 or above. May not be optimized for iPhone 5 or iPhone 5c.

Mattel reserves the right to terminate the View-Master®: Masters of the Universe® app after October 15, 2018.

For further questions about the View-Master®: Masters of the Universe® app, please contact customer support at www.service.mattel.com
